Hybrid game experience!

Lands of Ruin is a hybrid tabletop game. It is played with miniatures on a tabletop with a friend.

To play the game you will need you tribe miniatures. You can use the official Lands of Ruin miniatures or any other suitable miniatures from your collection.

Note that you can import pictures of any 3rd party miniatures to the app so purchasing the official Lands of Ruin miniatures is not mandatory!

You will also need at least one (although 5 is recommended) 20-sided-dice, a measuring tape in inches (you\'ll only need to measure distances up to 20\") and about 10 (30 recommended) Rotter (zombie) miniatures or tokens to track them. Both players need an Android tablet, Chromebook or a laptop running Bluestacks emulator. Beer is not required but recommended! We recommended a Bavarian Helles but we acknowledge your taste might be different (read: wrong).

If you don\'t yet have all the required stuff to play the game you can still check out the app and see how the game would work even in a single player mode.

Learning to play Lands of Ruin

Lands of Ruin is a tabletop strategy game played together with this tablet app. To play the game the players must first learn the game rules or play the tutorial scenario to learn.

The best place to start is our website where we list resources you can read, download and videos to watch.

This app also contains a lot of helpful resources to get started. Take a look at the various tutorial help screens to learn about different pars of the game.
